summary: This moves the NPC finely for screen shots.
descriptionHtml:
This moves the NPC finely for screen shots.
but not recommended for use on the player.

[b]Installation:[/b]
Unpack the contents to your Skyrim data folder.

[b]Require:[/b]
[url=http://skse.silverlock.org/]Skyrim Script Extender(SKSE)[/url]

[b]How to use[/b]
1 - Use a spell [SAP Spell Target] which added at game start to NPC.
2 - Move the NPC with hold keys.
[Delete] - Move X axis
[PageDown] - Move Y axis
[Home] - Move Z axis
[PageUp] - Rotation Z axis
[LeftShift] - Invert translation
[LeftAlt] - Fast translation
3 - Release the NPC with [End] key.

[b]Version:[/b]
1.0 - Initial
author: anano
